attributes.action: Let 11-19 Year Old's toHave a Vote in General Elections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Student Vote is a campaign to get Secondary Students' aged between 11 and 19 to have their vote in political polls. I hope to achieve this before the next elections and will take this up to the highest point I possibly can.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
